description: Try our easy to follow A Bucket of Australian Prawns with Texas Green Chilli Mayonnaise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: A Bucket of Australian Prawns with Texas Green Chilli Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lime, juiced and rind finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a small fry pan over high heat & cook chillies turning for 5-10 minutes or until charred.
Place chillies, ginger, garlic, sugar, lime zest & juice, coriander & soy into the bowl of a small food processor & process for 1-2 minutes or until finely chopped.
Stir through mayonnaise & serve with buckets of prawns on ice.
